job_overview:

Job Responsibilities:

• Near-native English speaking and writing skills
• 2-3 years of marketing experience
• Graphic Design / Video Editing skills
• Content and/or Copywriting abilities
• Track record for creating and executing successful marketing campaigns
• Resourceful - The ability to find different resources and get things done

Preferred skills - BONUS if you have additional experience or skills in the following areas:
• Online Advertising
• Sales experience
• Public Relations (PR)
• SEO

When submitting your application, please respond to the following in numbered format. For questions that ask for your thoughts or experience, answer in complete sentences using proper grammar and punctuation. For the others, kindly provide accessible links or file attachments to your work samples.

1. How many years of work experience do you have in marketing?
2. What are your thoughts on AI?
3. Share 1–2 examples of successful marketing campaigns you’ve worked on. Walk us through the process from ideation to execution, and include the final results.
4. Provide at least one writing sample (e.g., blog article or sales copy).
5. Share examples of social media posts you’ve created (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.).

Note: Please ensure that any links you submit are viewable (no access requests needed).

Please write "I AM A MARKETING WHIZ" in the SUBJECT LINE so I know you did read the entire job description.
